markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Insect Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4730) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713)

</column>

---

Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures. Add the shapes in [_insect form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1575) to your untamed form list. Whenever you use untamed form to polymorph into the non-flying insect shapes listed in pest form, the duration is 24 hours instead of 10 minutes.
name: Insect Shape
